title: Yesus Ngut Beibi Song Daytong
lyrics:
Yesus ngut beibi song daytong
Met nje syolinak seh
Nande syoli kambung dunak mranupdang
Nje solinak pegu mamsong pegu arai kakdamse
Ngo tangse mengwalitab kindik daitung

Oh Yesus ma Oh Yesus ma
Kmong krum kemsingsong
kmong krung dmo bu arung tase
Pi kumtrung syolinak brone
Syolinak syolinak dunya paine

title: Oh Yerusalem Wary ksop
lyrics:
Oh yerusalem wali wali ksop
Kandei dambu ngonesye

Warangkbadari Aiwary pungarang
Met nengrei-nengrei katdangse

title: Aiwary Kame Tamlak Daleye
lyrics:
Aiwary kame tamlak daleye
Jeh dunia ne
Dunia karang wabu mase

Oh.. a.. Yesus
Kameng nmbut pu yamtru
Nje wary yap ma sri

Kmong kama alei ngakbalei kameng
Nmbut tup de
